# Data

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(DT)
library(kickout)
library(dplyr)
library(stringr)


source("../Scripts/fetch_data.R")

start_data <- events |> 
  select(Date, Event, Discipline, Competition, Competitor, Country, Club, Stage, 'Routine Number',
         Rank, Total, Mark, '# Elements', Execution, T, D, H)
  
compact_data <- start_data |> 
  select(-c(year))

update_raw_data <- reactive(
  compact_data)
```

## Column

### All Events

```{r}
renderDT(
  update_raw_data(), rownames = F, extensions = 'Buttons', filter="top", editable=T,
  options = list(
    dom = 'Blfrtip',
    buttons = c('csv', 'excel', 'pdf', 'print'),
    lengthMenu = list(c(10,50,100,-1),c(10,50,100,"All"))
  )
)
```
